author: William "Billy" Tarling
description: The grassy notes of Zubr√≥wka and delicate cinnamon shine through in this well-balanced and well-integrated delicately spicy vintage cocktail.
name: Zubrowka Cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, top with water and stand to one side
Separately STIR other ingredients with ice
Dump contents of glass and strain stirred drink into the absinthe washed glass
